_header: A man was of the Pharisees / That prince was holden of the Jews
_description: Gospel for Trinity Sunday in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: A man was of þe pharisewsþat prince was halden of þe iews…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And won with crist in his kingdomeGod grante vs grace þeder to cum
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Erat homo ex phariseis & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo sancte trinitatis Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 99rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.245-252.
